TopicTitle: Don't know how to get aspects of Texture Replacer working.

Articles.Content: So I've downloaded the latest version and the oly thing that is working is the replacement visor texture for EVA. Nothing else is though. The instructions for how to actually make anything work were impenetrably obscure for me but what I think they were saying to do was to dump the image files of everything you want replaced in the "default folder", which is what I did, with Rareden's skybox and I-forget-which set of planet texture improvements. It's not doing anything for me though. Any suggestions?
